title: Writing tests with AI, but not LLMs
description: Animesh Mishra, senior solutions engineer at Diffblue, joins Ryan and Ben to talk about how AI agents can help you get better test coverage. Animesh explains how agentic AI can expedite and enhance automation and refactoring processes, how Diffblue leverages machine learning techniques to write effective unit tests, and why clear use cases and trust are so important in developing AI tools. Plus: Why Diffblue sees Copilot as a complement, not a competitor.
author: Eira May
excerpt: Animesh Mishra, senior solutions engineer at Diffblue, joins Ryan and Ben to talk about how AI agents can help you get better test coverage. Animesh explains how agentic AI can expedite and enhance automation and refactoring processes, how Diffblue leverages machine learning techniques to write effective unit tests, and why clear use cases and trust are so important in developing AI tools. Plus: Why Diffblue sees Copilot as a complement, not a competitor.

Plus: Why Diffblue sees Copilot as a complement, not a competitor. Credit: Alexandra Francis
html:
February 24, 2025

Animesh Mishra, senior solutions engineer at Diffblue, joins Ryan and Ben to talk about how AI agents can help you get better test coverage. Animesh explains how agentic AI can expedite and enhance automation and refactoring processes, how Diffblue leverages machine learning techniques to write effective unit tests, and why clear use cases and trust are so important in developing AI tools. Plus: Why Diffblue sees Copilot as a complement, not a competitor.
